Academic.name: Hover Vehicles for OpenTTD
Academic.description: OpenTTD is a transportation logistics game, and I ("Hazzard") created this mod to add hovering vehicles to it. I programmed the mod using the NewGRF Meta Language (NML) and it features 276 sprites of different trucks and cargoes hand-drawn by me. It currently has over 133,000 downloads and counting.
